author: David Grant
title: Meet RuPaul’s hot rancher boyfriend
text:
With a personality as over-the-top as RuPaul ‘s, the last place you might expect him to be settling down is Wyoming, the least populous state in the nation. (About as many people live there as on Staten Island.) 
But it’s true: RuPaul has an on-again, off-again partner who lives on a ranch in Wyoming. His name is Georges LeBar, and they’ve been seeing each other for 23 years. 
Related: Not everyone is happy about “RuPaul’s Drag Race” moving to VH1 on Friday nights 
The two were recently photographed enjoying a nice day in Manhattan , and it brings a sweet smile to our faces to see Mama Ru looking so happy and relaxed. 
Ru opened up about the relationship in a “Where are they now” segment (um hello! when did anyone lose track of where he is?!) on Oprah , which you can conveniently re-visit below: 


h/t Instinct
